name: V60 Dripper & a 250gm bag of Coffee Gift Pack
description:
One of the cheapest, but one of the best ways to brew your coffee. Insert a paper filter into the ceramic cone, flush with water, add your ground coffee then simply pour your water through and it drips into the cup below. Simple enough to make a good cup everytime, but still plenty of challenges to nail that perfect cup!
PLUS a 250gm bag of delicious Crafted coffee
Purchase one of these awesome packs between now and December 20th 2013 and you will be gifted a $10 Crafted Coffee Gift Voucher, Merry Christmas!

name: Brazil Moreninha Formosa 250gm
description:
A group of 31 plots make up a larger farm called Aurea and Moreninha Formosa is one of those plots. Fazenda Aurea is in a region called Serra do Salitre, a high plain in Cerrado Miniero, Minas Gerais state. At 1200 meters, the Serra do Salitre has better altitude than most of Cerrado proper, which averages 800-900 meters for coffee production.

It is a Mundo Novo varietal. The coffee is all dried on raised African beds to promote even drying and the results speak for themselves. A coffee which is very dynamic for a Brazilian, this coffee leads off with a touch of unexpected acidity and quickly flows into a refined, but still distinctly natural processed body. A berry sweeteness runs into a pleasant cocoa aftertaste. This coffee is really well suited to espresso in any percentage from Single through to Blends. We have just landed some more of this fresh crop coffee.

name: 3 Month Subscription- Roasters Cup Coffees
description:
Let us take all of the hassle out of your weekly coffee fix. EVERY WEEK for 3 months we will deliver our weekly "Roasters Cup Coffee" to your door. Each week you will receive a different and exciting coffee. Your coffee will be sent on Wednesday of each week so you can enjoy it before the weekend.

This is an amazing value deal. Our Roasters Cup Coffees are normally a minimum of $16/ 250gm plus freight. Our special price for our first round of subscription coffees ever, even INCLUDES freight! We must be nuts!

We have had amazing support for our Roasters Cup Coffees and we want to see more of you enjoying them. This is an incredibly good value deal, heck its great at the normal price! We have seen some stunning micro-lot, CoE and super special coffees through to date, and there are lots more on the water and coming from new crops.

This is awesome not only for yourself, but makes a great present for someone who enjoys their coffee as much as you!

name: 3 Month Subscription "2 Weeker"- Espresso Blend  NEW!
description:
We understand what it's like to enjoy your weekly espresso at home every week. We also know it can be a pain to have to go and hunt it down every week, and that you only remember to get it on Saturday morning when you reeeaallly want it straight away. We can solve that for you!

We hunt down some coffees that work brilliantly for espresso and we constantly look to challenge ourselves with our blends. In the Crafted Cafe we change up the blend often. Each fortnight we will send out the very best blend that we discover that week.

name: 3 Month Subscription- "Espresso Blend"

name: Tiamo TCA- 3 Cup Japanese Syphon
description:
This cloth filter brewer is not only fun and exciting to use but it produces a clean crisp cup that showcases the distinct qualities of a coffee.

Simply place water in the bottom globe and heat with the burner. Water vapor forces the water into the top chamber, where the coffee grinds are placed. Give the grinds a couple of good stirs. Brewing time should take between 45 and 90 seconds. Remove heat, once this is done the coffee is siphoned back down to the bottom globe. Remove top chamber and is ready to serve.
Pay attention to every sip as the next one will be different. the flavour changes as the temperature changes.
The 3 cup siphon pours 375ml

Try a unique coffee experience and order your syphon today.

description:

name: Tiamo Ceramic Coffee Dripper V01 - 1 Cup
description:
One of the cheapest, but one of the best ways to brew your coffee. Insert a paper filter into the ceramic cone, flush with water, add your ground coffee then simply pour your water through and it drips into the cup below.
Simple enough to make a good cup everytime, but still plenty of challenges to nail that perfect cup!
Almost no fuss, and importantly no mess as the end of a coffee. Just throw away the paper filter and quickly rinse the cone with water.

This is easily the "Crafted Staff's Choice" of brewing method at the moment. Seriously, just buy one!

Other products required - Tiamo VO1 Filter Papers (Sold Separately)

name: Tiamo Ceramic Coffee Grinder - Large
description:
Have perfectly ground coffee at home. The adjustable grinding burrs can be altered to produce the correct grind for vitually every coffee brewing method.

These hand grinders are particularly useful for grinding coffee for use with V series coffee drippers.

Ground coffee container has a capacity of 110g

name: Tiamo Coffee Grinder - Small
description: The Tiamo 60gr coffee grinder is small and light weight. The grind is easily adjusted for the perfectly ground coffee every time.

name: 600ml Steaming Jug
description: Something every home barista needs, this 600ml milk pitcher will help you froth your milk to perfection every time.

name: Multi-Function Timer
description: Use this to help get the perfect brewing extraction.

name: Tiamo Mini Gas Burner
description: A great addition to any syphon kit for the home barista. Easy to refill.

name: Tiamo Kettle
description:
Perfect kettle for those who are using the pour over brewers like the Chemex or V60. The thinner spout allows for a slower pour rate which can make sure the coffee is evenly saturated in the 'Bloom' Stage. 

Hands down this kettle gives you the control you need to make that perfect cup of coffee.
